GSD.description:
xen: delay xen_hvm_init_time_ops() if kdump is boot on vcpu>=32

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.189 by commit 8a7462b5211cd5b74b8815034d038e28cbd96d52. For more details please see the references link.
